attributes.action: ban non-recycable materals from supermarkets and takeaway outlets and use bio-degradable materials instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plastic is problematic for the environment, and this problem needs sorting out! Too much of the earth's natural resources are wasted in the UK, we waste far more than practically any other nation in the world. Please sign this petition to get this problem sorted and encourage the use of brown paper bags and boxes instead of plastic carrier bags and boxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
